item.title: Jami add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Jami add a quote by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
item.description: "Neither a lofty degree of intelligence nor imagination nor both together go to the making of genius. Love, love, love, that is the soul of genius." -- Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

item.title: Jami add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Jami add a quote by Viktor E. Frankl
item.description: "We who lived in concentration camps can remember the men who walked through the huts comforting others, giving away their last piece of bread. They may have been few in number, but they offer sufficient proof that everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of the human freedoms -- to choose one's attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one's own way." -- Viktor E. Frankl

item.title: Jami add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Whatever you do will be insignificant, but it is very important that you do it." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jami add a quote by Pierre de Courbertin
item.description: "The most important thing in life is not the triumph but the struggle. The essential thing is not to have conquered but to have fought well." -- Pierre de Courbertin

item.title: Jami add a quote by Margaret Landon
item.description: "She sat still, trying to hush her secret heart." -- Margaret Landon
